code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{AppBar,Toolbar,Typography,Button}from'@mui/material';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{AuthContext}from'../context/AuthContext';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const{auth,logout}=useContext(AuthContext);const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogout=()=>{logout();navigate('/login');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AppBar,{position:"static",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Toolbar,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h6",style:{flexGrow:1},children:"Payroll Management"}),auth.token?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{color:"inherit",component:Link,to:"/",children:"Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{color:"inherit",component:Link,to:"/employees",children:"Employees"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{color:"inherit",component:Link,to:"/payroll",children:"Payroll"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{color:"inherit",component:Link,to:"/attendance",children:"Attendance"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{color:"inherit",component:Link,to:"/leave",children:"Leave"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{color:"inherit",component:Link,to:"/reports",children:"Reports"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{color:"inherit",onClick:handleLogout,children:"Logout"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{color:"inherit",component:Link,to:"/login",children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{color:"inherit",component:Link,to:"/register",children:"Register"})]})]})});};export default Navbar;
